name: Quinidiom
description:
Endlessly bounce from tile to tile as you orbit around Quinidiom’s Core gathering letters to submit words. Rise to the challenge of the Core as accelerating gameplay tests your fortitude and offers maximum bonus potential.


1. Rotate around the Core to land your bouncer on the desired letter-tile.
2. Letters are automatically added to the end of the word in your inventory.
3. Submitting words clears your inventory and calculates bonus points.


  • Accelerating audio to match increased game speeds.
  • Mania: Timed game mode with 5 and 10 minute limits.
  • Spree: Unlimited game mode where errors reset progress.
  • 13 custom bouncers unlockable through gameplay.
  • Top 5 high-score list for each game mode.
  • Custom word list allows players to add unique valid words.
  • End-game progress report & skill ranking.


Quinidiom accepts 3 to 10 letter words from a compilation of publicly available word lists resulting in over 125,000 valid words.
